GK19akadambu:1: śriyaṃ diśantu vaḥ śaurer dvaye tulyaśramāḥ kramāḥ /
GK19akadambu:2: ye cādau goṣpadaṃ paścāt trailokyaṃ krāmyataś ca ye // AKad_1.1 //
GK19akadambu:6: yāvan malinam apy eṣāṃ karma dṛṣṭeḥ prasādhanam // AKad_1.3 //
GK19akadambu:7: guṇaḥ kṛśo 'pi prathate pṛthur apy apacīyate /
GK19akadambu:8: prāpya sādhukhalau candraḥ pakṣāv iva sitāsitau // AKad_1.4 //
GK19akadambu:18: ajāyata sutaḥ kāntaś candro dugdhodadher iva // AKad_1.9 //
GK19akadambu:21: vṛttikāra iti vyaktaṃ dvitīyaṃ nāma bibhrataḥ /
GK19akadambu:24: sūnuḥ samudabhūt tasmād abhinanda iti śrutaḥ // AKad_1.12 //
GK19akadambu:29: babhūva vidiśā nāma purī vetravatītaṭe // AKad_1.14 //
GK19akadambu:34: ākhaṇḍala iva śrīmān rājā śūdraka ity abhūt // AKad_1.16 //
GK19akadambu:35: aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ rūpaṃ bibhrad api prajāḥ /
GK19akadambu:36: śaśvad ānandayaṃs tābhiś candramā ity avedi yaḥ // AKad_1.17 //
GK19akadambu:41: vinodair atyanīyanta nave vayasi vāsarāḥ // AKad_1.19 //
GK19akadambu:43: yūno 'pi suratakrīḍāparāṅ mukham abhūn manaḥ // AKad_1.20 //
GK19akadambu:45: hartuṃ śaśāka yā tasya hṛdayaṃ cakṣur eva vā // AKad_1.21 //
GK19akadambu:50: śrutvā kṣaṇaṃ parāmṛśya mukham ālokya mantriṇām /
GK19akadambu:51: samādideśa tāṃ rājā ko doṣaḥ praviśatv iti // AKad_1.24 //
GK19akadambu:56: praviśantīṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kanyām adbhutadarśanām /
GK19akadambu:57: paraṃ vyasmayata kṣmāpaḥ kṣaṇaṃ caivam acintayat // AKad_1.27 //
GK19akadambu:58: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ kāntir ime lāvaṇyaśīkarāḥ /
GK19akadambu:59: martyatām api na prāhurmātaṅgatve tu kā kathā // AKad_1.28 //
GK19akadambu:60: tat satyam eva paśyāmi nūnaṃ mātaṅgamāyayā /
GK19akadambu:61: channeyaṃ devatā kācin martyalokam upāgatā // AKad_1.29 //
GK19akadambu:67: ratnānāṃ cāspadaṃ devo dugdhodadhir ivāparaḥ // AKad_1.32 //
GK19akadambu:69: prasādaḥ kriyatām asyā vihagaḥ parigṛhyatām // AKad_1.33 //
GK19akadambu:70: ity uktvā so 'grato rājñaḥ pañjaraṃ maṇikuṭṭime /
GK19akadambu:73: akarot pañjaraṃ tasmān niryayau ca vihaṅgamaḥ // AKad_1.35 //
GK19akadambu:74: utkṣipya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ jayaśabdam udīrya saḥ /
GK19akadambu:77: carati vimuktāhāraṃ vratam iva bhavato ripustrīṇām // AKad_1.37 //
GK19akadambu:80: dṛṣṭaṃ bhavadbhir āścaryam īdṛśaṃ śrutam eva vā /
GK19akadambu:81: tiryaktve 'tiśayaḥ ko 'yaṃ yo manuṣyeṣu durlabhaḥ // AKad_1.39 //
GK19akadambu:83: mātaṅgeṣu ca kanyeyam ity āścaryaparamparā // AKad_1.40 //
GK19akadambu:85: bhavanty atiśayāḥ prāyaḥ prāṇināṃ ko 'tra vismayaḥ // AKad_1.41 //
GK19akadambu:89: vicitras tadvipākaś ca vicitraḥ kālaparyayaḥ // AKad_1.43 //
GK19akadambu:94: ity ādiśya pratīhārīṃ sabhām aujjhan mahīpatiḥ /
GK19akadambu:95: visasarja ca rājanyacakraṃ sevārtham āgatam // AKad_1.46 //
GK19akadambu:97: hutāgniḥ śrutaviprāśīr bhuktvā śayyāgṛhaṃ yayau // AKad_1.47 //
GK19akadambu:98: tatra paryaṅkam āruhya dhyātvaiva kim api kṣaṇam /
GK19akadambu:99: tam antaḥpuraviśrāntaṃ śukam ānāyayat punaḥ // AKad_1.48 //
GK19akadambu:102: vaiśampāyana ko nu tvaṃ kva jātaḥ kvoṣitaś ciram /
GK19akadambu:103: kutastyam idam īdṛk te kalāśāstrādikauśalam // AKad_1.50 //
GK19akadambu:104: manye jātismaraḥ ko 'pi bhavān bhūmim imāṃ gataḥ /
GK19akadambu:105: na hy asty atiśayaprāptir iyatī pakṣijātiṣu // AKad_1.51 //
GK19akadambu:106: kena vā bhavato nāma kṛtaṃ viprajanocitam /
GK19akadambu:108: kathaṃ caṇḍālasamparka iha vā katham āgamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:109: iti kārtsnyena vṛttāntam ātmano vaktum arhasi // AKad_1.53 //
GK19akadambu:111: kṣaṇaṃ buddhyānusaṃdhāya śuko vaktuṃ pracakrame // AKad_1.54 //
GK19akadambu:125: divā tāny abhinirvartya prāṇayātrām itas tataḥ /
GK19akadambu:126: tatrāgatya svanīḍeṣu sukhaṃ rātriṣu śerate // AKad_1.61 //
GK19akadambu:128: jāto 'ham ekas tanayas tayor vayasi paścime // AKad_1.62 //
GK19akadambu:130: tayaiva pañcatāṃ nītā jananī me durātmanaḥ // AKad_1.63 //
GK19akadambu:133: na śaśāka kvacid gantum ātmanaḥ prāṇavṛttaye /
GK19akadambu:134: māṃ vakṣasi nidhāyāsta nīḍa eva divāniśam // AKad_1.65 //
GK19akadambu:140: abhūt kalakalas tasminn araṇye yamadundubhiḥ // AKad_1.68 //
GK19akadambu:146: tato mṛtam ivātmānam utkhātam iva śālmalim /
GK19akadambu:149: murhūrtād eva tadvyādhair athāraṇyam apūryata // AKad_1.72 //
GK19akadambu:153: pulindaiḥ saha senānīḥ sa jagāma yathāgatam // AKad_1.74 //
GK19akadambu:154: eko jaratpulindas tu pāpas tatra vyalambata /
GK19akadambu:157: yamadūtīm iva dṛśaṃ sa dadau tatra śālmalau // AKad_1.76 //
GK19akadambu:158: sa durārohatāṃ tasya jānann api mahātaroḥ /
GK19akadambu:162: sa tu pāpas tam āruhya taruṃ nīḍanivāsinaḥ /
GK19akadambu:163: hatvā hatvā yathāśakti śukān bhūmāv apātayat // AKad_1.79 //
GK19akadambu:165: babhañja taṃ ca cikṣepa kṣitau vigatajīvitam // AKad_1.80 //
GK19akadambu:166: tadā mama na tacchoko nānyat kiñcic ca cetasi /
GK19akadambu:171: śukān gatāsūn ādāya vyādhān anusarann agāt // AKad_1.83 //
GK19akadambu:178: tathāpy atinirutsāhaḥ patan muhur itas tataḥ /
GK19akadambu:179: tam eva pāpakarmāṇaṃ śaṅkamānaḥ pade pade // AKad_1.87 //
GK19akadambu:180: ciraṃ hā tāta tāteti śocan kaṇṭhāntavartibhiḥ /
GK19akadambu:185: tatas tasmin sutas tasya sarasi snātum āgataḥ /
GK19akadambu:186: hārītanāmā māṃ tatra tadavasthaṃ vyalokayat // AKad_1.90 //
GK19akadambu:190: kṛtāhnikaś ca kāruṇyād anayat pitur āśramam // AKad_1.92 //
GK19akadambu:192: padaṃ sthiram iva nyastaṃ hṛdi me jīvitāśayā // AKad_1.93 //
GK19akadambu:194: iti pitre praṇamyāsau pāṇisthaṃ māmadarśayat // AKad_1.94 //
GK19akadambu:195: atha jābālim adrākṣaṃ sākṣād iva pitāmaham /
GK19akadambu:199: sa tu māṃ kṣaṇam udvīkṣya smayamāna ivāvadat /
GK19akadambu:200: idaṃ hi bhujyate 'nena phalaṃ svasyaiva karmaṇaḥ // AKad_1.97 //
GK19akadambu:203: vacas tad ākarṇya kutūhalākulāḥ sametya sarve munayas ta mabruvan /
GK19akadambu:204: babhūva ko 'yaṃ bhagavan bhavāntare kim asya vā duścaritaṃ tad ucyatām // AKad_1.99 //
GK19akadambu:205: abhyarthito munibhir ity uparudhyamānas tān abravīt kuruta tāvadahaḥkriyāḥ svāḥ /
GK19akadambu:206: sāṃdhyaṃ vidhāya vidhim askhalitāvadhānam ākarṇayiṣyatha kathāṃ pṛthum etadīyām // AKad_1.100 //
GK19akadambu:207: uktās tathā bhagavatā munayo nijena karmakrameṇa divasaṃ gamayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
GK19akadambu:208: hārītahastavihitaiś ca manovinodais tais tair ānīyata mayāpi dināvaśeṣaḥ // AKad_1.101 //
GK19akadambu:215: saṃhṛtya cāpalaṃ sarvam āsaṃ sthiramanās tadā // AKad_2.2 //
GK19akadambu:217: siñcann iva karair indur udagādāśramasthalīm // AKad_2.3 //
GK19akadambu:223: nidhir ujjayinī nāma nagarī guṇasampadām // AKad_2.6 //
GK19akadambu:225: te 'pi yām abhipaśyantaḥ sukhaṃ tāsu na śerate // AKad_2.7 //
GK19akadambu:230: tārāpīḍa iti śrīmān babhūva pṛthivīpatiḥ // AKad_2.9 //
GK19akadambu:232: visrabdham āsyate yatra sambhūya sakalair guṇaiḥ // AKad_2.10 //
GK19akadambu:235: amātyaḥ śukanāsākhyo brāhmaṇas tasya cābhavat // AKad_2.11 //
GK19akadambu:237: tasmin mantriṇi tadbhāraṃ nicikṣepa bharakṣame // AKad_2.12 //
GK19akadambu:238: tathā ca pālayāmāsa sa mantrī sakalāḥ prajāḥ /
GK19akadambu:239: yathā trividham apy etā na duḥkhaṃ kiñcid aspṛśan // AKad_2.13 //
GK19akadambu:241: rājā tathā tathātmānaṃ kṛtakṛtyam amanyata // AKad_2.14 //
GK19akadambu:247: asamāptajigīṣasya tā eva tu viḍambanāḥ // AKad_2.17 //
GK19akadambu:249: kalāsu kuśalaḥ kāmī bubhuje bhogasampadaḥ // AKad_2.18 //
GK19akadambu:250: na te bhogā na tāḥ krīḍā na tā goṣṭhyo na te rasāḥ /
GK19akadambu:251: na te vilāsā yeṣv asya pāragaṃ nābhavan manaḥ // AKad_2.19 //
GK19akadambu:253: sukham ekaṃ tu nājñāsīd apatyālokanodbhavam // AKad_2.20 //
GK19akadambu:254: yathā yathāsya kālena vyatīyāya navaṃ vayaḥ /
GK19akadambu:255: nirapatyatayā śoko vardhate sma tathā tathā // AKad_2.21 //
GK19akadambu:259: devatāyatanaṃ bāhyaṃ yayau bhartur anujñayā // AKad_2.23 //
GK19akadambu:261: aputrasya kuto lokā iti śuśrāva tatra sā // AKad_2.24 //
GK19akadambu:263: viveśa dadatī tasyāḥ parāṃ kām api vedanām // AKad_2.25 //
GK19akadambu:266: sakhībhiḥ prārthyamānāpi na svām abhajata sthitim /
GK19akadambu:267: nodasthāt kartum āhāraṃ virarāma na rodanāt // AKad_2.27 //
GK19akadambu:269: praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ prāha svairam enāṃ prasādayan // AKad_2.28 //
GK19akadambu:270: priye kim idam ārabdhaṃ rudyate kim akāraṇam /
GK19akadambu:271: na tvayā matkṛte manyur anubhūtaḥ kadācana // AKad_2.29 //
GK19akadambu:273: kas tavotpādayen manyuṃ yasmai kupyasi sundari // AKad_2.30 //
GK19akadambu:274: iti prasādyamānā sā yadā novāca kiñcana /
GK19akadambu:275: tadā viditavṛttāntas tatsakhyā nṛpatiḥ kṛtaḥ // AKad_2.31 //
GK19akadambu:278: ciraṃ ruditvā niḥśabdaṃ svayam unmṛjya locane /
GK19akadambu:279: jagāda gadgadaṃ rājā mahiṣīm upasāntvayan // AKad_2.33 //
GK19akadambu:280: mamāpi nanv iyaṃ devi cirāt prabhṛti duḥsahā /
GK19akadambu:282: viphalaṃ bata me rājyaṃ viphalā mama sampadaḥ /
GK19akadambu:283: viphalā mama sambhogā viphalaṃ mama jīvitam // AKad_2.35 //
GK19akadambu:286: vāñchan krīḍanakaṃ kiñcit kadā me pāpakarmaṇaḥ /
GK19akadambu:287: ākṛṣyati sutaḥ kūrcaṃ kim apy avyaktam ālapan // AKad_2.37 //
GK19akadambu:289: śukanāsa imāṃ vārtāṃ śrutvā satvaramāyayau // AKad_2.38 //
GK19akadambu:291: tasyāpy anena śokena gṛhe roditi gehinī // AKad_2.39 //
GK19akadambu:292: sa tu svāmigataṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkham ity avadhārayan /
GK19akadambu:295: śoko 'vakāśaṃ labhate hṛdaye na bhavādṛśām // AKad_2.41 //
GK19akadambu:296: yadi hi strīsvabhāvena devī viklavatāṃ gatā /
GK19akadambu:297: tat kiṃ pralambakūrcasya yuktaṃ devasya roditum // AKad_2.42 //
GK19akadambu:304: nāsti nāma jagaty asmin puruṣārthaḥ sa kaścana /
GK19akadambu:305: yo dharmaniratair dhīrais tvādṛśair nādhigamyate // AKad_2.46 //
GK19akadambu:307: utthāya svasthavat sarvā dampatī cakratuḥ kriyāḥ // AKad_2.47 //
GK19akadambu:309: citrāṇy akurutāṃ sarvā vyasmayanta tataḥ prajāḥ // AKad_2.48 //
GK19akadambu:313: svapne sapuṇḍarīkāṅkā sāpi tena vyalokyata // AKad_2.50 //
GK19akadambu:315: taṃ svapnaṃ kathayāmāsa śukanāsāya bhūpatiḥ // AKad_2.51 //
GK19akadambu:316: sānandaṃ so 'bhyadhād enaṃ sampannās te manorathāḥ /
GK19akadambu:317: acirāt soṣyate devī putraṃ pūrṇendusundaram // AKad_2.52 //
GK19akadambu:318: dineṣv atha vyatīteṣu keṣucid garbham agrahīt /
GK19akadambu:319: mahiṣī tatsakhībhyaś ca tam ajñāsīn nareśvaraḥ // AKad_2.53 //
GK19akadambu:320: tābhyaḥ prādāt sa vāsāṃsi citrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca /
GK19akadambu:323: cakāṅkṣa cātako meghān iva prasavavāsarān // AKad_2.55 //
GK19akadambu:324: sampūrṇe daśame māsi devī sutam asūta sā /
GK19akadambu:325: harṣeṇa ca jagat sarvaṃ parivṛttam ivābhavat // AKad_2.56 //
GK19akadambu:327: dṛṣṭvā lokeṣu māti sma na trivikramavat triṣu // AKad_2.57 //
GK19akadambu:328: śukanāsas tu rājānaṃ kaṇṭhe jagrāha nirbharam /
GK19akadambu:329: autsukyāt sūtikāvāsaṃ tāv ubhāv api jagmatuḥ // AKad_2.58 //
GK19akadambu:331: indor udayarāgārdraṃ navaṃ bimbam ivoditam // AKad_2.59 //
GK19akadambu:333: haste bhūpālam ālambya harṣagarbham abhāṣata // AKad_2.60 //
GK19akadambu:334: ayaṃ śaṅkha idaṃ cakram iyam ūrṇedam ambujam /
GK19akadambu:335: paśya bālasya cihnāni dṛśyante cakravartinām // AKad_2.61 //
GK19akadambu:336: yo 'sau svapne tvayā dṛṣṭaś candro devīmukhaṃ viśan /
GK19akadambu:337: sa evāyam ihotpanna iti mā saṃśayaṃ kṛthāḥ // AKad_2.62 //
GK19akadambu:339: śukanāsasya rājñaś ca harṣābdhir vavṛdhetarām // AKad_2.63 //
GK19akadambu:343: uttarīyaṃ jahārāsya pūrṇapātram iti svayam // AKad_2.65 //
GK19akadambu:344: uvāca cainaṃ paśyedaṃ sukhasyopari naḥ sukham /
GK19akadambu:345: ime te patitāḥ satyaṃ tuhine somaraśmayaḥ // AKad_2.66 //
GK19akadambu:347: sahaiva pātratāṃ nītau yad āvāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ // AKad_2.67 //
GK19akadambu:352: rājā tu svagṛhe kelivimardaṃ vīkṣya tādṛśam /
GK19akadambu:353: śukanāsagṛhaṃ gatvā dviguṇaṃ tam akārayat // AKad_2.70 //
GK19akadambu:355: vilāsavatyāṃ snātāyāṃ śucau kāla upasthite // AKad_2.71 //
GK19akadambu:358: sa bhūṣaṇāni vāsāṃsi varṣan parijane śiśoḥ /
GK19akadambu:359: candrāpīḍa iti svapnasadṛśaṃ nāma nirmame // AKad_2.73 //
GK19akadambu:361: vaiśampāyana ity ātmasūnor nāma praṇītavān // AKad_2.74 //
GK19akadambu:365: avyaktavarṇair ālāpair aharat sa tayor manaḥ // AKad_2.76 //
GK19akadambu:374: nṛpatis tv agamad draṣṭuṃ putraṃ gurukule sthitam /
GK19akadambu:375: prārthito 'pi sa tanmātrā nainam ānāyayad gṛham // AKad_2.81 //
GK19akadambu:380: prauḍhaḥ kalāsu sarvāsu dakṣaḥ sarveṣu karmasu /
GK19akadambu:382: krameṇa vardhamānaś ca sa vyāyāmam asevata /
GK19akadambu:388: rājā tu taṃ sutaṃ buddhvā kṛtārthaṃ guruveśmanaḥ /
GK19akadambu:391: puṇye 'hni prāhiṇot putram ānetuṃ kṛtamaṅgalaḥ // AKad_2.89 //
GK19akadambu:393: visasarja ca tenaiva saha putrānuvartinam // AKad_2.90 //
GK19akadambu:395: jitoccaiḥśravasaṃ tais tair ananyasadṛśair guṇaiḥ // AKad_2.91 //
GK19akadambu:397: adrākṣīdrājaputraṃ taṃ praṇanāma ca sādaram // AKad_2.92 //
GK19akadambu:398: ācacakṣe ca rājājñāṃ gṛham āgamyatām iti /
GK19akadambu:403: indrāyudhaṃ praveśyāśvaṃ punar āha balāhakaḥ // AKad_2.95 //
GK19akadambu:406: candrāpīḍas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā turaṅgamam anuttamam /
GK19akadambu:407: paraṃ vismayam āpede ciraṃ caivam acintayat // AKad_2.97 //
GK19akadambu:408: hṛdayaṃ me bravīty evaṃ naiṣa satyaṃ turaṅgamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:409: ko 'pi kenāpi śāpena nūnaṃ turagatāṃ gataḥ // AKad_2.98 //
GK19akadambu:413: tejasām ākṛter vāpi na sāmānyeṣu vājiṣu // AKad_2.100 //
GK19akadambu:418: yo 'si so 'si namas tubhyam ārohātikramas tvayā /
GK19akadambu:419: marṣaṇīyo 'yam asmākam āruroheti taṃ vadan // AKad_2.103 //
GK19akadambu:422: api trijagatīṃ kṛtsnāṃ mene hastagatām iva // AKad_2.104 //
GK19akadambu:424: rājaputraiḥ parivṛto viveśa nagarīṃ śanaiḥ // AKad_2.105 //
GK19akadambu:425: tam atha purataruṇyo rājamārgeṇa yāntaṃ dadṛśur atulakāntiṃ saudhavātāyanasthāḥ /
GK19akadambu:426: vyapagatagurulajjāḥ sambhramotkampitāṅgyaḥ smarajanitavikārair locanair arcayantyaḥ // AKad_2.106 //
GK19akadambu:433: nyastajānuḥ kṣitau mūrdhnā vavande caraṇau pituḥ // AKad_3.2 //
GK19akadambu:434: āliliṅga ca taṃ rājā cucumba śirasi kṣaṇāt /
GK19akadambu:435: grahītum aicchad utsaṅge sa tu bhūmāv upāviśat // AKad_3.3 //
GK19akadambu:436: draṣṭuṃ punaḥ punaḥ spraṣṭum atṛptenāpi bhūbhujā /
GK19akadambu:437: visṛṣṭo 'tha kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā mātaraṃ vandituṃ yayau // AKad_3.4 //
GK19akadambu:439: praṇamya jananīḥ sarvā nandayāmāsa vandanaiḥ // AKad_3.5 //
GK19akadambu:441: śukanāsam atha draṣṭum ayāsīt tasya mandiram // AKad_3.6 //
GK19akadambu:442: dvāri vājinam utsṛjya praviśya praśrayeṇa tam /
GK19akadambu:443: pitṛvat praṇanāmāsau maulinā medinīṃ spṛśan // AKad_3.7 //
GK19akadambu:444: namantam enam utthāpya svayam utthāya sādaram /
GK19akadambu:445: śukanāsas tu jagrāha kaṇṭhe pulakitānanaḥ // AKad_3.8 //
GK19akadambu:447: candrāpīḍaḥ kṣitāv eva tasya nyaviśatāgrataḥ // AKad_3.9 //
GK19akadambu:448: śukanāsaṃ ca muñcantam āsanaṃ svaṃ nyavārayat /
GK19akadambu:449: tatra kṣaṇam iva sthitvā draṣṭum āgān manoramām // AKad_3.10 //
GK19akadambu:453: sa vaiśampāyanasyāpi tādṛg eva gṛhadvaye // AKad_3.12 //
GK19akadambu:454: na kaścana sutasnehe viśeṣaś ca tayor abhūt /
GK19akadambu:455: mantriṇo rājaputre vā mantriputra nṛpasya vā // AKad_3.13 //
GK19akadambu:458: susaṃniveśam ālokya reme tatra cirāya saḥ /
GK19akadambu:461: mātrā visṛṣṭa āgatya kañcukī tam abhāṣata // AKad_3.16 //
GK19akadambu:463: kenāpi daivayogena paribhraṣṭā pitur gṛhāt // AKad_3.17 //
GK19akadambu:464: bālaiva vardhitā devyā svayam antaḥpure nije /
GK19akadambu:467: ity uktvopāharat kanyāṃ vinītāṃ priyadarśanām // AKad_19 //
GK19akadambu:469: sā tu tenārpitā kanyā tataḥ prabhṛti taṃ tathā /
GK19akadambu:470: asevata yathā cāsya nijaṃ cittam ivābhavat // AKad_3.20 //
GK19akadambu:472: tutoṣa ca guṇair asyāḥ śīlācāranayādibhiḥ // AKad_3.21 //
GK19akadambu:473: kiyatsv api vyatīteṣu divaseṣv atha pārthivaḥ /
GK19akadambu:480: nālpam apy upadeṣṭavyam asti sthiramates tava // AKad_3.25 //
GK19akadambu:481: kiṃ tu lokottarā lakṣmīr abhirāmam idaṃ vapuḥ /
GK19akadambu:482: navaṃ vayaḥ parā śaktir iti durviṣaho bharaḥ // AKad_3.26 //
GK19akadambu:484: viralās te vikārāya na yeṣāṃ tatparigrahaḥ // AKad_3.27 //
GK19akadambu:486: karoti bhaktavidveṣam asamaḥ śrīkṛto jvaraḥ // AKad_3.28 //
GK19akadambu:487: na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti nāpekṣante hitāhitam /
GK19akadambu:488: na vidmaḥ kiṃ nu ceṣṭante kaṣṭaṃ śrīviplutā narāḥ // AKad_3.29 //
GK19akadambu:490: hyo 'pi yatroṣitā lakṣmīs tatraivādya na dṛśyate // AKad_3.30 //
GK19akadambu:492: lakṣmīr nidhātuṃ śaknoti na kvacin nirbharaṃ padam // AKad_3.31 //
GK19akadambu:493: śrīḥ sapatnīm iva dveṣṭi dṛṣṭiṃ satpathavartinīm /
GK19akadambu:494: tāṃ vinā yatra tatraiva patanty andhā iveśvarāḥ // AKad_3.32 //
GK19akadambu:496: dhūrtair ete hi bhujyante hṛdayānupraveśibhiḥ // AKad_3.33 //
GK19akadambu:498: tair eva hi pravartyante mukhamādhuryapaṇḍitaiḥ // AKad_3.34 //
GK19akadambu:500: akasmāt pralayaṃ yānti gītaraktā mṛgā iva // AKad_3.35 //
GK19akadambu:501: viṣayeṣv atikaṣṭo 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ strīti nāma yaḥ /
GK19akadambu:502: jīvaty anyaiḥ kilākṛṣṭas tenākṛṣṭo na jīvati // AKad_3.36 //
GK19akadambu:504: sādhuṣv abhimukho nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnute // AKad_3.37 //
GK19akadambu:505: sa tvaṃ na vañcyase dhūrtair na sādhubhir upekṣyase /
GK19akadambu:506: yathā na bādhyase kāmaiḥ prayatethās tathā sadā // AKad_3.38 //
GK19akadambu:507: kāmaṃ bhavān prakṛtyaiva dhīraḥ pitrā ca saṃskṛtaḥ /
GK19akadambu:508: tvadguṇeṣv atisaṃtoṣo mukharīkurute sma mām // AKad_3.39 //
GK19akadambu:509: yugarāja dhuraṃ pitrā kalpitām udvaha sthirām /
GK19akadambu:510: vijitām api cānena punar jaya vasuṃdharām // AKad_3.40 //
GK19akadambu:512: candrāpīḍas tu tadvāgbhir alaṅkṛta ivābhavat // AKad_3.41 //
GK19akadambu:514: yauvarājye priyaṃ putram abhyaṣiñcan mahīpatiḥ // AKad_3.42 //
GK19akadambu:520: dadau digvijaye yātrāṃ yuvarājo nṛpājñayā // AKad_3.45 //
GK19akadambu:526: stutas tāraṃ paṭhadbhiś ca sūtamāgadhabandibhiḥ // AKad_3.48 //
GK19akadambu:528: pitarau śukanāsaṃ ca praṇamya niragādgṛhāt // AKad_3.49 //
GK19akadambu:531: śṛṇvan nagaryāḥ pūrveṇa dvāreṇa niriyāya saḥ // AKad_3.50 //
GK19akadambu:535: anyatra patralekhāṃ ca paśyann aśvaratīsthitām // AKad_3.52 //
GK19akadambu:537: citraṃ nivāsam adhyāsta siprākūle prakalpitam // AKad_3.53 //
GK19akadambu:542: rajasā ca tadutthena sthagayan gaganasthitān // AKad_3.55 //
GK19akadambu:544: avaśān utkhanan kāṃścid utkhātān pratiropayan // AKad_3.56 //
GK19akadambu:546: dasyūn utsādayan daṇḍaiḥ sādhūn saṃmānayan dhanaiḥ // AKad_3.57 //
GK19akadambu:548: navāni nijacihnāni tatra tatra pravartayan // AKad_3.58 //
GK19akadambu:550: sa babhrāma prabandhena māndhāteva vasuṃdharām // AKad_3.59 //
GK19akadambu:552: jigāya prathamaṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ tadanu dakṣiṇām /
GK19akadambu:553: tataḥ pratīcīṃ paścāc ca pratāpanidhiruttarām // AKad_3.60 //
GK19akadambu:555: sa suvarṇapuraṃ jitvā daṇḍaṃ jagrāha helayā // AKad_3.61 //
GK19akadambu:558: ekadā tu sa tatsthānād āruhyendrāyudhaṃ vane /
GK19akadambu:561: āditsuḥ prerayāmāsa tāv eva prati vājinam // AKad_3.64 //
GK19akadambu:566: tau ca parvatam ārūḍhāv agratas tasya kiṃnarau /
GK19akadambu:567: tatas tadgrahaṇākāṅkṣāṃ hṛdayād utsasarja saḥ // AKad_3.67 //
GK19akadambu:568: aśaknod anusartuṃ ca kaścit parijano na tam /
GK19akadambu:569: tārkṣyeṇāpy anugamyeta dhāvann indrāyudhaḥ kutaḥ // AKad_3.68 //
GK19akadambu:571: dṛṣṭvaikākinam ātmānaṃ śvasantaṃ ca turaṅgamam // AKad_3.69 //
GK19akadambu:574: aho kim api me maurkhyam asthānābhiniveśinaḥ /
GK19akadambu:575: yad ātmā bālakeneva vyartham āyāsito mayā // AKad_3.71 //
GK19akadambu:576: agṛhītena ko vārthaḥ ko 'rthaḥ prāptena vāmunā /
GK19akadambu:579: na cātra labhyate martyo mama mārgasya deśikaḥ // AKad_3.73 //
GK19akadambu:581: kailāsasaṃnikṛṣṭeyam iha martyasya kā kathā // AKad_3.74 //
GK19akadambu:583: na syur yadanusāreṇa yāsyāmi śibiraṃ nijam // AKad_3.75 //
GK19akadambu:585: gantavyaṃ kiṃ tu madhyāhnasamayo 'yam upasthitaḥ // AKad_3.76 //
GK19akadambu:586: anubhūto 'timātraṃ ca khedas tad iha sāmpratam /
GK19akadambu:587: labdhvā kuto 'py apastābhir yāsyāmi vigataśramaḥ // AKad_3.77 //
GK19akadambu:588: iti saṃcintya pānīyam anveṣitum itas tataḥ /
GK19akadambu:589: paribhraman ghanasnigdhaṃ śākhināṃ khaṇḍam aikṣata // AKad_3.78 //
GK19akadambu:593: sa panthānam athāpaśyad ambhasām anumāpakam // AKad_3.80 //
GK19akadambu:602: svayaṃ sasnau papau vāri bubhuje bisakandalīḥ /
GK19akadambu:610: utthāya candrāpīḍo 'tha tām eva diśam abhyagāt // AKad_3.88 //
GK19akadambu:616: bhagavantam umākāntaṃ dadarśa praṇanāma ca // AKad_3.91 //
GK19akadambu:620: sākṣāl lakṣmīr iva kṣīrajaladher madhyavartinī // AKad_3.93 //
GK19akadambu:626: keyaṃ syāt kanyakā nāsyā divyatāṃ prati saṃśayaḥ // AKad_3.96 //
GK19akadambu:628: nāntardhānam iyaṃ gacchen na vā gaganam utpatet /
GK19akadambu:629: na maunam avalambeta martyasaṃdarśanena vā // AKad_3.97 //
GK19akadambu:633: sātha gītaṃ samāpayya vinidhāya ca vallakīm /
GK19akadambu:635: atithe svāgataṃ te 'stu saumya viśramyatām iha /
GK19akadambu:636: prāpto 'si svām imāṃ bhūmim ita āgamyatām iti // AKad_3.100 //
GK19akadambu:637: candrāpīḍas tad ākarṇya bahv ātmānam amanyata /
GK19akadambu:638: vrajantīm anu vavrāja devatāvat praṇamya tām // AKad_3.101 //
GK19akadambu:644: sā ca vijñātavṛttāntā nirjagāma tato bahiḥ // AKad_3.104 //
GK19akadambu:645: gṛhītabhikṣāpātrā ca kṣaṇam āsta taror adhaḥ /
GK19akadambu:646: āpūryata svayaṃ śīrṇaiḥ phalais tad amṛtopamaiḥ // AKad_3.105 //
GK19akadambu:648: anvatiṣṭhad vacas tasyāḥ sa ca vismayamānadhīḥ // AKad_3.106 //
GK19akadambu:651: āgatya ca punas tasminn upaviṣṭā mṛgājine /
GK19akadambu:653: api nāma svavṛttāntaṃ madvad eṣāpi varṇayet /
GK19akadambu:654: pṛṣṭety evaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dadhyau candrāpīḍaḥ sakautukaḥ // AKad_3.109 //
GK19akadambu:655: dṛṣṭvā cāsyāḥ praśamamadhurām ākṛtiṃ bhāvaśuddhiṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ ca prakṛtisaralaṃ labdhavākyāvakāśaḥ /
GK19akadambu:656: ātmodantaṃ niyatam akhilaṃ vakṣyati prārthiteyaṃ candrāpīḍaḥ kṣaṇam atha kṛtapraśnasampratyayo 'bhūt // AKad_3.110 //
GK19akadambu:657: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryabhaṭṭaśrījayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ
GK19akadambu:667: puṇyena janmanā vaṃśo bhagavatyā vibhūṣitaḥ // AKad_4.4 //
GK19akadambu:675: iyam apy ākṛtir nāma duḥkhair yad abhibhūyate // AKad_4.8 //
GK19akadambu:677: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya vyāhartum upacakrame // AKad_4.9 //
GK19akadambu:679: pāpāyā mandabhāgyāyā vṛttāntena śrutena te // AKad_4.10 //
GK19akadambu:681: tad idaṃ varṇyate sarvam ākarṇaya yathākramam // AKad_4.11 //
GK19akadambu:682: suprasiddham idaṃ tāvat tava śrutipathaṃ gatam /
GK19akadambu:683: yat santy apsaraso nāma surasadmani kanyakāḥ // AKad_4.12 //
GK19akadambu:687: kanye munir ariṣṭeti dve dakṣasya babhūvatuḥ // AKad_4.14 //
GK19akadambu:693: rūḍhaṃ parasparaṃ prema tayor gandharvarājayoḥ // AKad_4.17 //
GK19akadambu:695: hemakūṭa iti khyātaḥ sa nivāsas tayor dvayoḥ // AKad_4.18 //
GK19akadambu:697: gandharvās tau ca visrambhabhūmir janmadviṣaḥ parā // AKad_4.19 //
GK19akadambu:698: atha yat somasambhūtam ekam apsarasāṃ kulam /
GK19akadambu:699: gaurī nāmodabhūt kanyā tasmin pratikṛtir vidhoḥ // AKad_4.20 //
GK19akadambu:701: tato yathārthaṃ nāmāpa sarvathā haṃsagāminī // AKad_4.21 //
GK19akadambu:703: tayor udabhavat sūnur eko 'pi na mahātmanoḥ // AKad_4.22 //
GK19akadambu:705: udabhūvaṃ tayor asya duḥkhabhārasya bhājanam // AKad_4.23 //
GK19akadambu:709: cakre varṇānurūpaṃ sa mahāśveteti nāma me // AKad_4.25 //
GK19akadambu:715: atha bālyāt paraṃ prāpam ahaṃ nānārasāspadam /
GK19akadambu:720: sakhībhiḥ saha paśyantī kānane vyaciraṃ ciram // AKad_4.30 //
GK19akadambu:730: tataḥ pravṛttam āmodaṃ samāghrātavatī muhuḥ // AKad_4.35 //
GK19akadambu:734: tataḥ kusumabāṇena nītāsi vaśam ātmanaḥ // AKad_4.37 //
GK19akadambu:740: patito gocare citram alaṅghyā bhavitavyatā // AKad_4.40 //
GK19akadambu:745: bhagavan kathyatāṃ ko 'yaṃ kimākhyaḥ kim ihāgataḥ /
GK19akadambu:746: karṇe ca nihitānena kasyeyaṃ mañjarī taroḥ // AKad_4.43 //
GK19akadambu:748: śvetaketur iti khyāto rūpeṇāpratimo muniḥ // AKad_4.44 //
GK19akadambu:750: nityaṃ saṃnihitā tatra lakṣmīr enaṃ vyalokayat // AKad_4.45 //
GK19akadambu:753: udapādi tadaivāsya kumāraḥ sa tayā śriyā /
GK19akadambu:754: tava putro 'yam ity uktvā nyavedi śvetaketave // AKad_4.47 //
GK19akadambu:755: so 'pi yogadṛśā dṛṣṭvā yathāvat sutam agrahīt /
GK19akadambu:756: nāma janmocitaṃ cāsya puṇḍarīka iti vyadhāt // AKad_4.48 //
GK19akadambu:758: atīte bālabhāve ca nyayuṅkta tapase pitā // AKad_4.49 //
GK19akadambu:759: ayaṃ sa puṇḍarīkas te varṇitaḥ śṛṇu mañjarīm /
GK19akadambu:762: tvadākṛter alaṅkāras tulyo 'yam iti sādaram // AKad_4.51 //
GK19akadambu:766: iti tasmin vadaty eva capale gṛhyatām iyam /
GK19akadambu:767: kim anena tava praśnalobhenety abhidhāya mām // AKad_4.53 //
GK19akadambu:769: apanīya nijāt karṇān mama karṇāvataṃsatām // AKad_4.54 //
GK19akadambu:772: tena praskhalitā hastād akṣamālā na lakṣitā // AKad_4.55 //
GK19akadambu:773: aprāptaiva ca sā bhūmiṃ gṛhītā sahasā mayā /
GK19akadambu:774: asminn avasare chattragrāhiṇī mām avocata // AKad_4.56 //
GK19akadambu:775: snātā devī ciraṃ bhartṛdārike gamyatām iti /
GK19akadambu:776: tataḥ pratinivṛttāyāṃ mayi taṃ sa sakhāvadat // AKad_4.57 //
GK19akadambu:777: vayasya kim idaṃ cetas tava viplutam īdṛśam /
GK19akadambu:778: hṛtām apy anayājñāsīr akṣamālāṃ na kanyayā // AKad_4.58 //
GK19akadambu:779: hṛtā nāmeyam anayā hṛdayaṃ nanu rakṣyatām /
GK19akadambu:780: tato 'sau punar āgatya kṛtakopam ivāvadat // AKad_4.59 //
GK19akadambu:781: apahṛtyākṣamālāṃ me kva cauri nanu gamyate /
GK19akadambu:782: atha mandaṃ vihasyeva mayāsya nihitā kare // AKad_4.60 //
GK19akadambu:786: sakhībhir api me dṛṣṭam idaṃ cāpalam ity aham /
GK19akadambu:788: atrāham asvatantraiva kṣaṇaṃ snātvā yathā tathā /
GK19akadambu:789: agaccham ambayā sākaṃ tadguṇādhyāyinī gṛham // AKad_4.63 //
GK19akadambu:792: kva gatāsmi kim uktāsmi tena ko 'sāvahaṃ ca kā /
GK19akadambu:793: kim idaṃ kaḥ prakāro 'yam iti nājñāsiṣaṃ tadā // AKad_4.65 //
GK19akadambu:795: priyā taralikā nāma praviśyedam athābravīt // AKad_4.66 //
GK19akadambu:796: karṇe munikumāreṇa kṛtā te yena mañjarī /
GK19akadambu:797: tvayyāgatāyāṃ pṛṣṭāsmi svarūpaṃ tena tāvakam // AKad_4.67 //
GK19akadambu:798: tacchrutvā ca svayaṃ tena likhitvā vastrapaṭṭikā /
GK19akadambu:799: ekākinyai tvayā tasyai deyetyuktvā samarpitā // AKad_4.68 //
GK19akadambu:800: tatas taralikāyās tāṃ hastād ādāya paṭṭikām /
GK19akadambu:801: tasyāṃ tu likhitām āryām imām aham avācayam // AKad_4.69 //
GK19akadambu:803: haṃsa iva darśitāśo mānasajanmā tvayā nītaḥ // AKad_4.70 //
GK19akadambu:805: mohāyāryāpy anāryeva sutarāṃ manaso mama // AKad_4.71 //
GK19akadambu:806: vada tena kim uktāsi sa kim uktas tvayāpi vā /
GK19akadambu:807: tadantike ca visrabdham uṣiṭāsi kiyacciram // AKad_4.72 //
GK19akadambu:808: itthaṃ taralikāṃ tat tad ālapantī punaḥ punaḥ /
GK19akadambu:809: kāñcid ahnas tato mātrām unmattevātyavāhayam // AKad_4.73 //
GK19akadambu:811: bhartṛdārikayā dṛṣṭau yau tau munikumārakau // AKad_4.74 //
GK19akadambu:813: śīghraṃ praveśayety uktā mayā tadabhiśaṅkayā // AKad_4.75 //
GK19akadambu:814: sā ca praveśayāmāsa tasya taṃ sahacāriṇam /
GK19akadambu:818: dṛṣṭiṃ taralikāyāṃ sa vaktukāmaḥ kṣaṇaṃ nyadhāt /
GK19akadambu:819: mayā so 'jñāyi pṛṣṭas tu lajjamāna ivābhyadhāt // AKad_4.78 //
GK19akadambu:820: ahaṃ kapiñjalo nāma tasya bālasuhṛn muneḥ /
GK19akadambu:821: na vāk pravartate me 'sminn anabhyasta ivādhvani // AKad_4.79 //
GK19akadambu:822: kvāyaṃ munijanaḥ śāntaḥ kva cāmī rāgavibhramāḥ /
GK19akadambu:824: tad ucyate prayātāyāṃ rājaputri tadā tvayi /
GK19akadambu:825: haste muktāvalīṃ bibhrat sa madantikam āgataḥ // AKad_4.81 //
GK19akadambu:827: vihasya sa mayā noktaḥ kiñcic cintopaśāntaye // AKad_4.82 //
GK19akadambu:829: na so 'sty upāyo mantro vā yo mayā nābhyadhīyata // AKad_4.83 //
GK19akadambu:831: kṣaṇam antarhito mattaḥ sutarāṃ mām apīḍayat // AKad_4.84 //
GK19akadambu:832: kṛcchrād iva mayā labdho vicitya sakalaṃ vanam /
GK19akadambu:833: anya eva sa saṃvṛtto vacasāṃ yo na gocaraḥ // AKad_4.85 //
GK19akadambu:838: trapayā tadavastho 'pi sa kiñcid vaktum akṣamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:839: sabāṣpamalināṃ dīnāṃ mayi dṛṣṭim apātayat // AKad_4.88 //
GK19akadambu:842: ataḥ paraṃ tu sāmarthyagatārthā mama yā giraḥ /
GK19akadambu:843: kaṇṭhe viparivartante nūnaṃ tvam api vettha tāḥ // AKad_4.90 //
GK19akadambu:844: iti tasmin vadaty eva praviśya prāha kañcukī /
GK19akadambu:845: tvam asvasthaśarīreti jñātvā devī samāgatā // AKad_4.91 //
GK19akadambu:847: na sa prativacaḥ kiñcin māmakīnam apaikṣata // AKad_4.92 //
GK19akadambu:848: taduktāṃ tu daśāṃ tasya janasyāvetya tādṛśīm /
GK19akadambu:849: āgatāṃ nāgatāṃ vāpi nāham ambām alakṣayam // AKad_4.93 //
GK19akadambu:850: tataḥ kamalinīṃ raktāṃ tyaktvā kvāpi gate ravau /
GK19akadambu:851: udite sarvathā vāme vidhau vaidhuryadāyini // AKad_4.94 //
GK19akadambu:853: punas taralikām eva sāśrukaṇṭham avādiṣam // AKad_4.95 //
GK19akadambu:854: ahaṃ yathā tathā vāpi bhaveyaṃ sa tu matkṛte /
GK19akadambu:855: kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīty eṣā cintā dalayatīva mām // AKad_4.96 //
GK19akadambu:857: itaḥ kāmo vasanto 'pi viraho maraṇād bhayam // AKad_4.97 //
GK19akadambu:858: vada kiṃ karavāṇy atra muhyatīva mano mama /
GK19akadambu:859: mā bhūn me varake vipraprāṇabādhena majjanam // AKad_4.98 //
GK19akadambu:861: jahāra cetanāṃ mūrchā nidreva nayanadyutim // AKad_4.99 //
GK19akadambu:864: kiṃ śāstraṃ guravaḥ ke ca kā lajjā kā kulasthitiḥ /
GK19akadambu:865: rakṣyantām ātmanaḥ prāṇā yūnas tasya ca sarvathā // AKad_4.101 //
GK19akadambu:867: śāstreṣu paṭhitas tasmāt tūrṇam uttiṣṭha gamyatām // AKad_4.102 //
GK19akadambu:869: tām ekām agrataḥ kṛtvā nirgatāham alakṣitā // AKad_4.103 //
GK19akadambu:871: tadā me dakṣiṇaṃ cakṣur aspandata muhur muhuḥ // AKad_4.104 //
GK19akadambu:875: puṇḍarīka kva yāto 'si śūnyaṃ kṛtvā jagattrayam // AKad_4.106 //
GK19akadambu:876: hā hato 'smi vilīno 'smi dagdho 'smi karavāṇi kim /
GK19akadambu:877: gatvā tātasya vakṣyāmi śvetaketoḥ kim agrataḥ // AKad_4.107 //
GK19akadambu:879: hṛtā me suhṛdo 'muṣya prāṇavṛttir api tvayā // AKad_4.108 //
GK19akadambu:880: vayasya dehi me vācaṃ na jīvāmi tvayā vinā /
GK19akadambu:886: kiṃ cireṇāgatāsīti ruṣitveva tathā sthitam // AKad_4.111 //
GK19akadambu:887: etāvad uktvā mūrchādhiṃ svavṛttāntam ataḥ param /
GK19akadambu:888: vivakṣantīva sā kanyā nipapāta śilātale // AKad_4.112 //
GK19akadambu:892: toyaiś ca śiśirasvacchaiḥ saṃjñām enām ajigrahat // AKad_4.114 //
GK19akadambu:893: avāpya cetanām eṣā smṛtvā tadvyasanaṃ nijam /
GK19akadambu:894: tad evānubhavantīva ruroda vilalāpa ca // AKad_4.115 //
GK19akadambu:895: tarūṇām apy abhajyanta hṛdayāni tadā śucā /
GK19akadambu:898: āstāṃ na śakyate vaktuṃ śrotuṃ cānyad ataḥ param // AKad_4.117 //
GK19akadambu:899: katham apy upasaṃhṛtya śokāvegaṃ tu sāvadat /
GK19akadambu:900: kim ataḥ param asty anyad vācyaṃ śrotavyam eva vā // AKad_4.118 //
GK19akadambu:902: rājaputra bibharmīdaṃ tad āścaryaṃ bravīmi te // AKad_4.119 //
GK19akadambu:904: na kācin maraṇādanyā mayāgrāhi pratikriyā // AKad_4.120 //
GK19akadambu:906: niriyāya ca candramaṇḍalāt puruṣaḥ ko 'pi himopamadyutiḥ // AKad_4.121 //
GK19akadambu:907: so 'vatīrya gaganān mahītale taṃ nidhāya bhujapañjarāntare /
GK19akadambu:908: utpatan divam udārayā girā mām avocata piteva sāntvayan // AKad_4.122 //
GK19akadambu:909: virama maraṇodyogād asmāt priyeṇa tavāmunā punar api mahāśvete vatse bhaviṣyati saṃgamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:910: iti giram ahaṃ tasmāc chrutvā sasambhramavismayā kim idam iti taṃ tatrāpṛcchaṃ prasṛtya kapiñjalam // AKad_4.123 //
GK19akadambu:912: mama vacanam adattvā kiñcid evātivegā kṛtaparikarabandhaḥ so 'py agād antarikṣam // AKad_4.124 //
GK19akadambu:913: paśyantyāṃ mayi te trayo 'pi viviśuḥ śītatviṣo maṇḍalaṃ tatsampratyayasaṃhṛtocitavidhiḥ sāhaṃ śritedaṃ vratam /
GK19akadambu:914: tātenaitya tataḥ prabhṛty aham ihāsīnātha netuṃ gṛhaṃ yatnenāpi na pāriteti suciraṃ sthitvā gataḥ svān gṛhān // AKad_4.125 //
GK19akadambu:915: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryabhaṭṭaśrījayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre caturthaḥ sargaḥ
GK19akadambu:921: sakampavismayo 'py antas tām avocata sāntvayan // AKad_5.2 //
GK19akadambu:924: sā tvamarhasi kalyāṇi na śokaṃ kartum īdṛśam /
GK19akadambu:925: āśvāsitāsi devena nūnaṃ candramasā svayam // AKad_5.4 //
GK19akadambu:927: nirgatya tatraiva viśan niśi sambhāvyate naraḥ // AKad_5.5 //
GK19akadambu:931: nāsty eva tasya tapasām asādhyaṃ nāma kiñcana // AKad_5.7 //
GK19akadambu:933: mahāśvetāṃ samāśvāsya punaḥ papraccha tām asau // AKad_5.8 //
GK19akadambu:934: sā te taralikā nāma visrambhanibhṛtā sakhī /
GK19akadambu:935: gatā bhagavati kvādya na hi sā tvāṃ vimuñcati // AKad_5.9 //
GK19akadambu:937: śṛṇvannāpi nimittaṃ te yathā sā prahitā mayā // AKad_5.10 //
GK19akadambu:939: varṇito yena devo 'yaṃ pratyaṣṭāpi maheśvaraḥ // AKad_5.11 //
GK19akadambu:940: yena khānitam atyaccham acchodākhyam idaṃ saraḥ /
GK19akadambu:941: yena caitrarathaṃ nāma kṛtam etac ca kānanam // AKad_5.12 //
GK19akadambu:943: mahiṣī madirā nāma jīvitād api vallabhā // AKad_5.13 //
GK19akadambu:946: tayā saha mahat prema bālyāt prabhṛti me tathā /
GK19akadambu:947: yathaikam eva jānāti jano jīvitam āvayoḥ // AKad_5.15 //
GK19akadambu:949: sāgrahīn niyamaṃ bālā vāryamāṇāpi bandhubhiḥ // AKad_5.16 //
GK19akadambu:951: tāvan mayā na kartavyaṃ pāṇigrahaṇam ātmanaḥ // AKad_5.17 //
GK19akadambu:952: ato yathā yathā tasyā yauvanaśrīr vijṛmbhate /
GK19akadambu:953: tathā tathā tato dhatte khedaṃ citrarathaḥ param // AKad_5.18 //
GK19akadambu:954: saṃdiṣṭaṃ tena me putri yatasvāvahitā tathā /
GK19akadambu:955: yathemaṃ durgrahagranthiṃ vimuñcati tava svasā // AKad_5.19 //
GK19akadambu:957: prahitā bahu saṃdiśya śvaś cāganteha sā punaḥ // AKad_5.20 //
GK19akadambu:959: candrāpīḍaḥ prayāte 'stam arke saṃdhyāvidhiṃ vyadhāt // AKad_5.21 //
GK19akadambu:963: kathām āścaryabahulāṃ tām eva dhyāyataś ciram // AKad_5.23 //
GK19akadambu:964: punaś cintayataḥ senāṃ vaiśampāyanam eva ca /
GK19akadambu:965: pattralekhāṃ ca sā rātrir gatā prāyeṇa jāgrataḥ // AKad_5.24 //
GK19akadambu:967: sapratyabhijñam aśvo 'pi bhṛśaṃ mānuṣavad dadau // AKad_5.25 //
GK19akadambu:969: samādher utthitāṃ buddhvā mahāśvetāṃ tadantikam // AKad_5.26 //
GK19akadambu:977: svasya svameva cedaṃ te manmanaḥ kiṃ parīkṣase // AKad_5.30 //
GK19akadambu:981: eṣa te pratisaṃdeśaḥ priyasakhyā niveditaḥ // AKad_5.32 //
GK19akadambu:983: cintayitvā kim apy antaś candrāpīḍam abhāṣata // AKad_5.33 //
GK19akadambu:985: tanoti sarvabhāvena niḥspṛhāṇām api spṛhām // AKad_5.34 //
GK19akadambu:987: tatra ko vā pratīkāraḥ svayaṃ madgamanād ṛte // AKad_5.35 //
GK19akadambu:988: ito na dūre gandharvarājadhānī tadadya tām /
GK19akadambu:992: candrāpīḍas tu tāṃ prāha bahūktvā bhavagaty alam /
GK19akadambu:993: anatikramaṇīyaṃ me munīnām api śāsanam // AKad_5.38 //
GK19akadambu:994: prāvartata tato gantuṃ sa mahāśvetayā saha /
GK19akadambu:995: padbhyām eva niyujyāśvaṃ prati keyūrakaṃ dṛśā // AKad_5.39 //
GK19akadambu:998: sa gatvā kiñcid adhvānaṃ candrāpīḍaḥ samāsadat /
GK19akadambu:1001: sapta kakṣā atikramya kanyāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // AKad_5.42 //
GK19akadambu:1009: sthitāṃ navasya lāvaṇyasindhor antas taraṅgiṇaḥ // AKad_5.46 //
GK19akadambu:1013: tasyāṃ nirūpayann antar acintayad atha kṣaṇam // AKad_5.48 //
GK19akadambu:1014: satyaṃ na kaścid āścaryanirmāṇeṣv avadhir vidheḥ /
GK19akadambu:1015: īdṛśāny api ratnāni sraṣṭuṃ prabhavati sma yaḥ // AKad_5.49 //
GK19akadambu:1016: moghaṃ yāti hareḥ kālo lakṣmīṃ vakṣasi bibhrataḥ /
GK19akadambu:1017: dehārdhena vahan gaurīṃ vañcitaś candraśekharaḥ // AKad_5.50 //
GK19akadambu:1019: ananyakarmaṇā yena nityam eṣā na dṛśyate // AKad_5.51 //
GK19akadambu:1024: ayaṃ hi bhārate varṣe sārvabhaumasya bhūpateḥ /
GK19akadambu:1031: madano 'ntaḥ praviśyāsyā babandha hṛdaye padam // AKad_5.57 //
GK19akadambu:1041: nālakṣayata sā ratnavalayaṃ skhalitaṃ karāt // AKad_5.62 //
GK19akadambu:1051: rājaputryau yuvāṃ draṣṭuṃ devī nirvighnam icchati // AKad_5.67 //
GK19akadambu:1053: candrāpīḍaṃ sukhāsīnam āyātaṃ mātur antikam // AKad_5.68 //
GK19akadambu:1058: atha mandaprabhe bhānau bheje kādabarī nijam /
GK19akadambu:1063: samaṃ nipetus tasyāṃ ca kusumāyudhasāyakāḥ // AKad_5.73 //
GK19akadambu:1065: tallāvaṇyaṃ pibantīva madalekhām uvāca sā // AKad_5.74 //
GK19akadambu:1066: na mayā madano nāma kathāsvapi sakhi śrutaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1067: adya pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaḥ sa candrāpīḍavigrahaḥ // AKad_5.75 //
GK19akadambu:1069: atha cehānayantyāmuṃ sarvam uktam anakṣaram // AKad_5.76 //
GK19akadambu:1070: api nāma vikāro me tadānīṃ lakṣitas tayā /
GK19akadambu:1071: kiṃ vā na lakṣayed eṣā dṛṣṭamanmathavikriyā // AKad_5.77 //
GK19akadambu:1073: manasaḥ saṃharāmy eva sthūlām api yathātathā // AKad_5.78 //
GK19akadambu:1074: kiṃ tv asau śeṣahāro 'syāstulyaṃ maṇḍanam ākṛteḥ /
GK19akadambu:1075: urasy anicchato 'py asya tūrṇam āmucyatāṃ tvayā // AKad_5.79 //
GK19akadambu:1076: madalekhā gṛhītvā taṃ hāraṃ gatvā tadantike /
GK19akadambu:1077: tathovāca yathā tena pratyuktā sā na kiñcana // AKad_5.80 //
GK19akadambu:1082: kādambarī ciraṃ tv enam avalokya niśāgame /
GK19akadambu:1085: avālambata dehena śayyāṃ cintāṃ ca cetasā // AKad_5.84 //
GK19akadambu:1086: kiṃ syur gandharvakanyāyā vilāsāḥ sahajā ime /
GK19akadambu:1087: utemaṃ janam uddiśya bālāṃ nartayati smaraḥ // AKad_5.85 //
GK19akadambu:1089: tathā sambhāvanā hīyaṃ mama cetasi vartate // AKad_5.86 //
GK19akadambu:1091: sa kālapariṇāmena na jāne kiṃ phaliṣyati // AKad_5.87 //
GK19akadambu:1093: kva mānuṣyaḥ kva gandharva iti kiṃ tena saṃgatam // AKad_5.88 //
GK19akadambu:1095: kālena vyajyate sarvaṃ kathaṃ ca mama sainikāḥ // AKad_5.89 //
GK19akadambu:1097: cakāra mukulākāre cakṣuṣī ā niśātyayāt // AKad_5.90 //
GK19akadambu:1099: kādambarīmahāśvete dṛṣṭvā labdhvā cirād iva // AKad_5.91 //
GK19akadambu:1101: sa indrāyudham āruhya pratasthe pṛtanāṃ prati // AKad_5.92 //
GK19akadambu:1102: atha kenāpy upāyena labdhamārgam asau nijam /
GK19akadambu:1104: tatra dṛṣṭvā nṛpān sarvān mantriputraṃ rahasy asau /
GK19akadambu:1106: niśi tasyām atītāyām anyedyur udite ravau /
GK19akadambu:1108: kādambarī na paṭvīti tvām abhīṣṇaṃ didṛkṣate /
GK19akadambu:1109: vismṛtaṃ śayanīye ca śeṣahāram upāharat // AKad_5.96 //
GK19akadambu:1111: candrāpīḍaḥ punas tūrṇaṃ hemakūṭam athāgamat // AKad_5.97 //
GK19akadambu:1117: tata utthātum icchantī śayānaivāsta tadgirā // AKad_5.100 //
GK19akadambu:1120: tathā tatra ciraṃ sthitvā tāṃ tathā vaśavartinīm /
GK19akadambu:1121: bhaṅgībhaṇitibhir vyaktam āvedya nijam āśayam // AKad_5.102 //
GK19akadambu:1125: avalokya tadānīṃ taṃ lekhaṃ svayam avācayat // AKad_5.104 //
GK19akadambu:1127: keyūrakakare nyasya taṃ lekhaṃ kūṇitekṣaṇaḥ // AKad_5.105 //
GK19akadambu:1128: tadartham atha saṃmantrya saha mantrisutena saḥ /
GK19akadambu:1129: evam etad iti dhyāyan prasthānasthairyam agrahīt // AKad_5.106 //
GK19akadambu:1130: satyaṃ vacmi bhavatprasādarasikaṃ ceto mamaitatpadaṃ gantuṃ necchati kiṃ tu śāsanam idaṃ nollaṅghanīyaṃ guroḥ /
GK19akadambu:1131: manyuḥ samprati sahyatāṃ punar ihāgantāsmi kādambarīṃ saṃdiśyeti sabāṣpagadgadam asau keyūrakaṃ prāhiṇot // AKad_5.107 //
GK19akadambu:1132: vaiśampāyanam abhyabhāṣata bhavān saṃvāhayan vāhinīṃ paścād eṣyati yāmi satvaram ahaṃ svalpair ito vājibhiḥ /
GK19akadambu:1133: niścityeti tadā prayāṇapaṭahe datte pratasthe tato gatvā kiñcana caṇḍikāśramataṭīm adhyāsta tasmin dine // AKad_5.108 //
GK19akadambu:1135: nītvā niśāṃ satatamaskhalitaprayāṇaiḥ svalpair dinais tvaritamujjayinīmavāpa // AKad_5.109 //
GK19akadambu:1136: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryabhaṭṭajayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre pañcamaḥ sargaḥ
GK19akadambu:1140: śukanāsaṃ ca so 'dhyāsta kumārabhavanaṃ punaḥ // AKad_6.1 //
GK19akadambu:1142: babhūva rataye nāsya kiñcitsthāsnu cariṣṇu ca // AKad_6.2 //
GK19akadambu:1143: nākarot priyam āhāraṃ nābodhi madhuraṃ rasam /
GK19akadambu:1144: na cādriyata vāsāṃsi na siṣeve vilepanam // AKad_6.3 //
GK19akadambu:1147: divā vibhāvarīṃ dhyāyan niśi vāñchan dināgamam /
GK19akadambu:1148: udīcīm eva sāsrākṣo vīkṣamāṇo 'niśaṃ diśam // AKad_6.5 //
GK19akadambu:1150: kiṃ vadet pattralekhāṃ vā sāpi kiṃ vocyate tayā // AKad_6.6 //
GK19akadambu:1152: kālaṃ kiyantam apy evaṃ candrāpīḍo 'tyavāhayat // AKad_6.7 //
GK19akadambu:1153: ākāraḥ saṃvṛtas tv īdṛg asya gūḍhātmano 'bhavat /
GK19akadambu:1154: yathā tāṃ śūnyatāṃ tasya pitarau nādhijagmatuḥ // AKad_6.8 //
GK19akadambu:1158: kādambarīm ivāmaṃsta pasparśa ca muhurmuhuḥ // AKad_6.10 //
GK19akadambu:1160: kim asmākaṃ smaraty eṣā ruṣitehāgamanena kim // AKad_6.11 //
GK19akadambu:1162: kim etaccintayā deva gurūn ārādhaya sthiram // AKad_6.12 //
GK19akadambu:1166: tīvre virahadāvāgnau kṣiptavānasi kiṃ vṛthā // AKad_6.14 //
GK19akadambu:1169: labdhasthairyāvadan māṃ ca pattralekhe kim īdṛśam /
GK19akadambu:1170: yuktam etasya yanmanye rakṣāṃsy api na kurvate // AKad_6.16 //
GK19akadambu:1171: tataḥ prabhṛti niḥśvāsair vardhamānair dinair iva /
GK19akadambu:1176: netre mādhuryamutsṛjya gate tasyāḥ kaṣāyatām // AKad_6.19 //
GK19akadambu:1180: mlānim ānīyate tasyā niḥśvāsair adharaḥ svaraiḥ // AKad_6.21 //
GK19akadambu:1181: stanau ca virahe tasyāḥ śokān na hi bahiṣkṛtau /
GK19akadambu:1184: vāḍavaś cābdhinā naiti śamam ity adbhutadvayam // AKad_6.23 //
GK19akadambu:1186: puline cakravākīva muhur luṭhati vihvalā // AKad_6.24 //
GK19akadambu:1188: śūnye bhujalate vīkṣya vilakṣā patati kṣitau // AKad_6.25 //
GK19akadambu:1189: mā gād ayam upālabdhaḥ saṃkalpād api dūrataḥ /
GK19akadambu:1190: ity upālabhate na tvāṃ bhīteva manasāpi sā // AKad_6.26 //
GK19akadambu:1192: tvadgātrakīlitā dṛṣṭis tasyāḥ samprati vartate // AKad_6.27 //
GK19akadambu:1198: diśo vīkṣya madutsaṅge nidhāya mukham abravīt // AKad_6.30 //
GK19akadambu:1199: uttiṣṭhānaya taṃ gatvā jīvantīṃ māṃ yadīcchasi /
GK19akadambu:1200: ahaṃ gantum aśaktā hi sudūram idam antaram // AKad_6.31 //
GK19akadambu:1201: sthitāyāṃ tvayi jīvāmi tvatsparśena yathā tathā /
GK19akadambu:1202: gatāyāṃ tu ciraṃ kālaṃ na sahante mamāsavaḥ // AKad_6.32 //
GK19akadambu:1203: iti śrutvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca samāyātāsmy ataḥ param /
GK19akadambu:1204: devaḥ pramāṇam ity uktvā rudatī virarāma sā // AKad_6.33 //
GK19akadambu:1206: labdhasmṛtiś ciraṃ dadhyau gamane hetum ātmanaḥ // AKad_6.34 //
GK19akadambu:1209: sa cojjayinyā vibhavaṃ praviśan vīkṣya vismitaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1210: sthāne nanu mano lagnaṃ svāminyā ity amanyata // AKad_6.36 //
GK19akadambu:1218: pattralekhāmukhaṃ vīkṣya saṃkṣiptam idam abravīt // AKad_6.40 //
GK19akadambu:1219: ukto 'si nānayā kiñcid uktaś cet kim iha sthitaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1220: uktaś ceha sthitaś cāsi kṛtam āgamanena me // AKad_6.41 //
GK19akadambu:1221: tathāpi vada saṃdeśam iti tena tu coditaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1222: punaḥ keyūrakaḥ prāha na hi vijñāpyase mṛṣā // AKad_6.42 //
GK19akadambu:1223: kathaṃ jīvatsu yuṣmāsu viraho hanti mām iti /
GK19akadambu:1224: tasyāḥ sākūtayā dṛṣṭyā visṛṣṭo 'smi na tadgirā // AKad_6.43 //
GK19akadambu:1226: adyāpi jīvatīty atra yathā dolāyate manaḥ // AKad_6.44 //
GK19akadambu:1227: tatkathābhis tathā sthitvā tasminn atha dine ciram /
GK19akadambu:1229: na rākṣaso na cāṇḍālo na kirātaś ca yady aham /
GK19akadambu:1230: acchodasarasas tīraṃ prāptaṃ māṃ vettha sarvathā // AKad_6.46 //
GK19akadambu:1232: keyūrakam asau ratnaiḥ prāhiṇot kṛtamaṇḍanam // AKad_6.47 //
GK19akadambu:1233: tayos tu gatayor āsta sutarāṃ khinnamānasaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1234: gamanāya dhiyā kiñcin nimittam anusaṃdadhat // AKad_6.48 //
GK19akadambu:1237: vaiśampāyanato lapsye kiñcit kāraṇam ity asau /
GK19akadambu:1238: pratyudgantum agād enaṃ kaṭakaṃ pitur ājñayā // AKad_6.50 //
GK19akadambu:1240: kva vaiśampāyanāvāsa iti senānyam abhyadhāt // AKad_6.51 //
GK19akadambu:1241: balāhakas tv adhodṛṣṭir ullikhan medinīṃ muhuḥ /
GK19akadambu:1244: hā vayasyeti vilapanprāvartata sa roditum // AKad_6.53 //
GK19akadambu:1246: deva maivaṃ kṛthāḥ so 'sti jīvann evety avocata // AKad_6.54 //
GK19akadambu:1247: candrāpīḍas tu taṃ prāha naiva śraddhīyate maya /
GK19akadambu:1248: na vaiśampāyano jīvan muhūrtaṃ māṃ vimuñcati // AKad_6.55 //
GK19akadambu:1249: iti sambhrāntacittaṃ taṃ punar āha balāhakaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1250: śrūyatāṃ deva tadvṛttaṃ yathāsāv iha nāgataḥ // AKad_6.56 //
GK19akadambu:1251: deva tādṛśam ādiśya prasthitaṃ tvām anuvrajat /
GK19akadambu:1254: vinodayitum ātmānaṃ sa cacāra vanasthalīḥ // AKad_6.58 //
GK19akadambu:1256: kiñcin naṣṭam ivānveṣṭum aicchad uttrastalocanaḥ // AKad_6.59 //
GK19akadambu:1258: sthīyatām adya śiṣṭās tu śvo draṣṭāsi vanasthalīḥ // AKad_6.60 //
GK19akadambu:1260: yāta yūyaṃ na gantavyaṃ yāvajjīvam ito mayā // AKad_6.61 //
GK19akadambu:1261: sa bahūni dināny āsta tatraiva vicaran vane /
GK19akadambu:1262: na ca kenāpyupāyena śaktaś calayituṃ tataḥ // AKad_6.62 //
GK19akadambu:1264: iyatā rājacakreṇa nārthito 'py atyajad graham // AKad_6.63 //
GK19akadambu:1265: tatas tatra ciraṃ sthitvā kāryaśeṣam apaśyatā /
GK19akadambu:1266: āyātam iha sainyena tvaṃ pramāṇam ataḥ param // AKad_6.64 //
GK19akadambu:1271: tatra kṣaṇam iva sthitvā svayaṃ pṛṣṭvā balāhakam /
GK19akadambu:1272: adhikṣipann iva prāha candrāpīḍaṃ kṣitīśvaraḥ // AKad_6.67 //
GK19akadambu:1274: yenāntaḥsphuratā so 'dya tvāṃ vihāya vanaṃ śritaḥ // AKad_6.68 //
GK19akadambu:1275: viyuktau na purā dṛṣṭau yuvāṃ kṣaṇam api kvacit /
GK19akadambu:1276: kiṃ jātamadhunā yena tvaṃ gṛhe sa tapovane // AKad_6.69 //
GK19akadambu:1277: vinā na hi nimittena śakyā soḍhuṃ garīyasī /
GK19akadambu:1279: ity uktavati bhūpāle śukanāsas tataḥ param /
GK19akadambu:1283: alātavṛṣṭir indor vā kṣīrād vā kaṇṭakodgamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1284: tasya manyuḥ kumārād vā kasya sambhāvanāspadam // AKad_6.73 //
GK19akadambu:1285: pāpaḥ sa eva durjātaḥ suciraṃ pāṭhitaḥ śukaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1287: sa tvaṃ kumāra sarvasyāḥ pṛthivyā ekajīvitam /
GK19akadambu:1288: durātmano na tasyārthe śokam udvoḍhum arhasi // AKad_6.75 //
GK19akadambu:1289: tasmin viratavākye tu patitvā pādayoḥ pituḥ /
GK19akadambu:1292: gatvā tam ānayāmīha tvam anujñātum arhasi // AKad_6.77 //
GK19akadambu:1294: tato guṇaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā krameṇa mama vetsyasi // AKad_6.78 //
GK19akadambu:1295: tatrasthaṃ tam anānīya mayaitat svagṛhaṃ punaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1296: na praveṣṭavyam ity eṣa gṛhyatāṃ mama niścayaḥ // AKad_6.79 //
GK19akadambu:1298: apaśyan mantriṇo vaktraṃ sa ca tatra bahūktavān // AKad_6.80 //
GK19akadambu:1300: candrāpīḍo niruddho 'pi nācalan niścayāt tataḥ // AKad_6.81 //
GK19akadambu:1302: karuṇaṃ vilapantī ca ciram enam abodhayat // AKad_6.82 //
GK19akadambu:1304: nūnam andhībhavāmy eva tvayi putra gate punaḥ // AKad_6.83 //
GK19akadambu:1305: itthaṃ vilāsavatyā ca tayā ca karuṇoktibhiḥ /
GK19akadambu:1306: ciram ārdrīkṛto 'pyeṣa na jahāti sma niścayam // AKad_6.84 //
GK19akadambu:1308: yathā jānāsi putreti katham apy avadan nṛpaḥ // AKad_6.85 //
GK19akadambu:1309: dattānujñas tataḥ pitrā praṇamya sakalān gurūn /
GK19akadambu:1311: candrāpīḍaḥ pathi śrāntān vinivartya yathā tathā /
GK19akadambu:1314: senayā saha rājāpi viveśa nagarīṃ śanaiḥ // AKad_6.88 //
GK19akadambu:1316: svagṛhān apraviśyaiva sa candrāpīḍam anvagāt // AKad_6.89 //
GK19akadambu:1319: nājīgaṇad drumān adrīn na nadīr na vanasthalīḥ /
GK19akadambu:1320: na rātriṃ nāpi divasaṃ dhāvann indrāyudhena saḥ // AKad_6.91 //
GK19akadambu:1323: tām apy agaṇayitvāsau vrajan katipayair dinaiḥ /
GK19akadambu:1326: mahāśvetām atha draṣṭuṃ sa jagāma tadāśramam // AKad_6.94 //
GK19akadambu:1330: nirīkṣya cakṣuṣā pṛṣṭā candrāpīḍena sābravīt // AKad_6.96 //
GK19akadambu:1332: dināni katicit sthitvā kādambaryā niketane // AKad_6.97 //
GK19akadambu:1334: vipraṃ yuvānam adrākṣaṃ vicinvantaṃ vanasthalīḥ // AKad_6.98 //
GK19akadambu:1339: sa bahūni dināny āsta tathā mām upapīḍayan // AKad_6.100 //
GK19akadambu:1340: ekadā tu śayānāṃ mām āgatya niśi nistrapaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1343: jalam uddhṛtya śapto 'sau mayānudhyāya devatāḥ // AKad_6.102 //
GK19akadambu:1345: gaccha dūraṃ durācāra śuka eva bhaviṣyasi // AKad_6.103 //
GK19akadambu:1346: śāpena tena mahatā madanāgninā vā janmāntaropacitaduṣkṛtakarmaṇā vā /
GK19akadambu:1347: citreṇa vā bhagavataś caritena dhātuḥ prāṇān asāv udasṛjan nipapāta corvyām // AKad_6.104 //
GK19akadambu:1348: ākrandataḥ parijanātmaśuco 'paredyur jñāto mayā sa śukanāsasutaḥ sakhā te /
GK19akadambu:1349: tat paśya māṃ priyavayasyaviyogahetum astatrapām akaruṇāṃ prakhalām abhavyām // AKad_6.105 //
GK19akadambu:1350: iti śrutvā bhinnaḥ prasabham iva śūlāgraśikhayā kadā tvāṃ paśyeyaṃ kamalamukhi kādambari punaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1351: vadann evaṃ śokasphuṭitahṛdayas tatkṣaṇam asūñ jahac candrāpīḍas tarur iva papāta kṣititale // AKad_6.106 //
GK19akadambu:1352: tato bhugnagrīvaṃ mukulitasitāpāṅganayanaṃ prabhāṃ tanvīṃ dīnām iva vidadhataṃ dikṣu śanakaiḥ /
GK19akadambu:1353: kṣitau visrastāṅgaṃ patitam amum ālokya vivaśā mahāśvetā sadyaḥ katham api na yāti sma dalaśaḥ // AKad_6.107 //
GK19akadambu:1354: draṣṭuṃ dīnām iva vasumatīm akṣamas tena śūnyāṃ kurvannudyandviradakaruṇākrandinaś cakravākān /
GK19akadambu:1355: abrahmaṇyadhvanim iva karaurūrdhvaśākhair vimuñcann astaṃ tigmadyutir api tataḥ kṣāmadhāmā jagāma // AKad_6.108 //
GK19akadambu:1356: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryaśrībhaṭṭajayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ //
GK19akadambu:1359: tasminn avasare bālā kādambary api vedhasā /
GK19akadambu:1361: asau hi pattralekhāyā mukhāt keyūrakasya ca /
GK19akadambu:1364: mahāśvetāśramaṃ prāptaṃ pratyudgantum iyeṣa tam // AKad_7.03 //
GK19akadambu:1369: tasyās taralikāṃ gehaṃ śīghram āgamyatām iti /
GK19akadambu:1370: saṃdiśya prāhiṇot sā ca tūrṇaṃ gatvā tathāvadat // AKad_7.06 //
GK19akadambu:1373: gamanotkalikāṃ dadhre buddhau kādambarī tataḥ // AKad_7.07 //
GK19akadambu:1377: keyūrakaṃ ca tatraiva dine tāṃ bhuvamāyayau // AKad_7.09 //
GK19akadambu:1382: āsādya ca tam uddeśaṃ karuṇaṃ rodanadhvanim /
GK19akadambu:1385: ity asau śaṅkamāneva viveśa drutam āśramam // AKad_7.13 //
GK19akadambu:1387: mahāśvetāṃ ca tām ārtaninādaṃ rudatīṃ bhṛśam // AKad_7.14 //
GK19akadambu:1391: mumoca sahasā prajñāṃ nipatantī śilātake // AKad_7.16 //
GK19akadambu:1392: kādambaryā tu dhairyeṇa pṛṣṭā taralikā tadā /
GK19akadambu:1395: labdhasaṃjñāṃ mahāśvetāṃ madalekhāṃ ca sāvadat // AKad_7.18 //
GK19akadambu:1398: yathāyogyena gacchāmi na hi śaknomi roditum /
GK19akadambu:1399: sakhi me darśitaḥ panthā nāthenaiva mahātmanā // AKad_7.20 //
GK19akadambu:1401: prāṇāneva priyānaujjhītsa panthāḥ kva gato mama // AKad_7.21 //
GK19akadambu:1402: yuktaṃ sakhi mahāśvete tava prāṇitum īdṛśam /
GK19akadambu:1403: jīvitā devatābhis tvaṃ punas tatsaṃgamāśayā // AKad_7.22 //
GK19akadambu:1405: karomi durbhagaiḥ prāṇaiḥ kiṃ kalyāṇabahiṣkṛtā // AKad_7.23 //
GK19akadambu:1406: madalekhe tathā kuryās tāto 'mbā ca kule sthitau /
GK19akadambu:1407: madviyogopatāpena yathā na dhṛtim ujjhataḥ // AKad_7.24 //
GK19akadambu:1410: kumāras tatra citrastho mayaiva likhitaḥ svayam /
GK19akadambu:1411: rakṣaṇīyo yathā nāstam eti citrasthito 'py asau // AKad_7.26 //
GK19akadambu:1415: tatroṣitaṃ kumāreṇa na hi so 'nyasya śobhate // AKad_7.28 //
GK19akadambu:1419: snehān mayā svayaṃ siktam asti līlāvanaṃ navam // AKad_7.30 //
GK19akadambu:1421: muktaḥ kaṅkaṇako nāsyā mocanīyas tvayaiva saḥ // AKad_7.31 //
GK19akadambu:1424: gṛhe muhur apaśyantī mām asau capalekṣaṇā /
GK19akadambu:1425: nūnaṃ hariṇikā cāste prāpayes tāṃ ca kānanam // AKad_7.33 //
GK19akadambu:1426: śukaḥ sa parihāso me kālinī sā ca śārikā /
GK19akadambu:1427: yathā na kalahāyete tathā kuryāḥ pratikṣaṇam // AKad_7.34 //
GK19akadambu:1429: svāṅke śāyayitavyāsau yathā yāti na dūrataḥ // AKad_7.35 //
GK19akadambu:1430: kiṃ kāryam athavā gehe cintayā dīrghayānayā /
GK19akadambu:1432: keyūraka ciraṃ kiṃ mām atidīnām avekṣase /
GK19akadambu:1433: uttiṣṭha cinu kāṣṭhāni samāhāra hutāśanam // AKad_7.37 //
GK19akadambu:1435: kumāram amum ādāya patāmi varam ambhasi // AKad_7.38 //
GK19akadambu:1437: iyantam api jīvantī kālaṃ lajje 'ham ātmanā // AKad_7.39 //
GK19akadambu:1438: draṣṭavyāsi kadety evam abhidhāyaiva māṃ gataḥ /
GK19akadambu:1439: seyaṃ cirayatīty evam adhunābhidadhīta saḥ // AKad_7.40 //
GK19akadambu:1446: tvaṃ hi vatse mahāśvete pūrvamāśvāsitā mayā /
GK19akadambu:1453: na sprakṣyati vikāro yad enaṃ bhūtasvabhāvajaḥ // AKad_7.47 //
GK19akadambu:1454: ity uktvā jyotiṣā tena sahasaiva tirodadhe /
GK19akadambu:1455: savismayas tadā cābhūd akhilaḥ kanyakājanaḥ // AKad_7.48 //
GK19akadambu:1456: pattralekhā ca tenaiva jyotiṣo vacanena sā /
GK19akadambu:1457: labdhasaṃjñā samutthāya gatvā ca tvaritaiḥ padaiḥ // AKad_7.49 //
GK19akadambu:1459: tenaiva sahitāgādham aviśan madhyam ambhasaḥ // AKad_7.50 //
GK19akadambu:1461: sā dadarśa payomadhyād udgacchantaṃ kapiñjalam // AKad_7.51 //
GK19akadambu:1467: rājaputry api nāmāyaṃ pratyabhijñāyate janaḥ // AKad_7.54 //
GK19akadambu:1468: ahaṃ kapiñjalas tasya vayasyo dayitasya te /
GK19akadambu:1470: kādambaryā tvayā caitāḥ śrutāś candramaso giraḥ /
GK19akadambu:1471: madīyam api vṛttāntam adhunā śṛṇutaṃ yuvām // AKad_7.56 //
GK19akadambu:1472: apy utkṣipya tathā nīte vayasye tena tatkṣaṇam /
GK19akadambu:1473: ahaṃ gaganam utplutya tam evānusarann agām // AKad_7.57 //
GK19akadambu:1475: paścād eva praviṣṭaṃ mām avalokyedam abravīt // AKad_7.58 //
GK19akadambu:1476: kapiñjala mṛgāṅkaṃ māṃ viddhi so 'haṃ tavāmunā /
GK19akadambu:1477: vayasyena vṛthā śapto hemakūṭagate tvayi // AKad_7.59 //
GK19akadambu:1479: udito 'haṃ nije kāle tataḥ pravikiran karān // AKad_7.60 //
GK19akadambu:1481: kaṇṭopāntagalaprāṇo rūkṣaṃ māṃ vīkṣya śaptavān // AKad_7.61 //
GK19akadambu:1483: mariṣyasi tathaiva tvamindo janmani janmani // AKad_7.62 //
GK19akadambu:1484: pratiśapto mayāpyeṣa tvam apy evaṃ mariṣyasi /
GK19akadambu:1489: śarīramasya rakṣāmi sāmṛtair aham aṃśubhiḥ // AKad_7.65 //
GK19akadambu:1490: ity utkṣipya mayehāyam ānītas tvaṃ ca satvaram /
GK19akadambu:1491: gatvā nivedayemaṃ tu vṛttāntaṃ śvetaketave // AKad_7.66 //
GK19akadambu:1494: sa ca mām aśapat kopād aśveneva tapobalāt /
GK19akadambu:1495: tvayāhaṃ laṅghitas tasmād aśva eva bhaviṣyasi // AKad_7.68 //
GK19akadambu:1497: pramādān na tapodarpān mama tat saṃhara krudham // AKad_7.69 //
GK19akadambu:1498: sa tv abhāṣata datto 'yaṃ śāpo bhavati nānyathā /
GK19akadambu:1506: smṛtis turagabhāve 'pi na me naṣṭā kadācana /
GK19akadambu:1508: vīpsānvitaś ca śāpo 'yaṃ parasparam abhūt tayoḥ /
GK19akadambu:1509: dvitīyajanmayogena tayor bhāvyam ato dhruvam // AKad_7.75 //
GK19akadambu:1511: dvitīyajanmagrahaṇaṃ kva tayoś ceti veditum // AKad_7.76 //
GK19akadambu:1514: dvitīye 'py aham evāsya jātā janmani mṛtyave /
GK19akadambu:1515: śapto madanurakto 'sau mayeti vilalāpa sā // AKad_7.78 //
GK19akadambu:1516: kapiñjalas tadā tv evaṃ rudatīṃ tām avārayat /
GK19akadambu:1517: abravīc cāvadhiḥ pūrṇaḥ prāyo duḥkhasya vartate // AKad_7.79 //
GK19akadambu:1522: kādambarī tam aprākṣīd bhagavan sā kva vartate /
GK19akadambu:1523: pattralekheti sa tv āha mayā nājñāyi tadgatiḥ // AKad_7.82 //
GK19akadambu:1529: kādambaryāḥ sthiraṃ citte sā pratyayam ajījanat // AKad_7.85 //
GK19akadambu:1532: abhiṣicya jalaiḥ svacchair anulipya ca candanaiḥ /
GK19akadambu:1533: ānarca candrāpīḍasya dehaṃ kādambarī ciram // AKad_7.87 //
GK19akadambu:1534: yadi satyo 'yam āśvāsaḥ sarvaṃ svastham athānyathā /
GK19akadambu:1535: kva gato me tadā mṛtyur ity antar niścikāya sā // AKad_7.88 //
GK19akadambu:1536: jagāda ca mahāśvetām idānīṃ nanu na trape /
GK19akadambu:1539: āvayoś cirasaṃrūḍhaṃ sakhīprema na dūṣitam // AKad_7.90 //
GK19akadambu:1540: tataḥ prabhṛti sā mūrtim arcayantyāsta tāpasī /
GK19akadambu:1543: candrāpīḍasya paśyantī sthirām āśāṃ babandha sā // AKad_7.92 //
GK19akadambu:1545: viditas tava sarvo 'rtho vṛttānto bahuvismayaḥ // AKad_7.93 //
GK19akadambu:1547: arhasy ujjayinīṃ gantuṃ prabhor āśvāsakāraṇāt // AKad_7.94 //
GK19akadambu:1548: so 'bravīd devi tatrānyaṃ prajñātaṃ prahiṇomy aham /
GK19akadambu:1549: yuvarājam ihotsṛjya na gantuṃ svayam utsahe // AKad_7.95 //

GK19akadambu:1771: diṣṭyā vardhayituṃ nyayuṅkta rabhasenāhūya keyūrakaṃ tārāpīḍatapovane parijanaṃ pitror gṛhe cāparam // AKad_8.88 //
GK19akadambu:1773: tasmin kāle sakhisahacaraḥ puṇḍarīko 'pi nākāt kiñcillajjāvanatavadano vallabhāṃ svām upetaḥ // AKad_8.89 //
GK19akadambu:1774: candrāpīḍaḥ svām api jānann atha mūrtiṃ tārāpīḍaṃ putravad eva praṇanāma /
GK19akadambu:1775: tadvat taṃ ca praśrayaśīlaḥ śukanāsaṃ dattānando 'vandata sarvāś ca janitrīḥ // AKad_8.90 //
GK19akadambu:1776: māyā dhātur iyaṃ bhaved bhagavataḥ kiṃ śvetaketor idaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tapasām athendumahasām atrendrajālāyitam /
GK19akadambu:1777: vaiśampāyana ity avedi yad asāv eko 'pi tadbandhubhir yac cāsau sa tu puṇḍarīka iti te tasmin bhave saṃsthitāḥ // AKad_8.91 //
GK19akadambu:1778: sa puṇḍarīko munir apy apaśyad ātmānam antaḥ śukanāsaputram /
GK19akadambu:1779: praṇamya bhūmau pitaraṃ krameṇa manoramādyā jananīr vavande // AKad_8.92 //
GK19akadambu:1782: tārāpīḍas tu pādānatam anavarataprasrutānandabāṣpaś candrāpīḍaṃ bhujābhyāṃ katham api sahasotthāpya kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā /
GK19akadambu:1783: śāpenātrāvatīrṇo yadi tad api bhavān uttamo lokapālaḥ prakhyāpyeti pratīpaṃ praṇatatanur asāv asya pādau vavande // AKad_8.94 //
GK19akadambu:1784: tasmai nivedya nṛpacakram anicchate 'pi yatnāt kramopanatayā saha rājalakṣmyā /
GK19akadambu:1785: nojjhāñcakāra cirasaṃcitam āśramaṃ sat tatprārthito 'pi mahiṣīsahitaś caturtham // AKad_8.95 //
GK19akadambu:1786: ājagmus tatra valgatturagakhurapuṭoddhūtadhūlīkaḍāraiś cūḍāpratyuptabhāsvanmaṇiruciruciraiḥ śobhamānāḥ śirobhiḥ /
GK19akadambu:1789: sārdhaṃ citrarathas tato madirayā haṃsaś ca gauryā saha draṣṭuṃ nṛttamayīm iva vyavasitām ājagmatur medinīm // AKad_8.97 //
GK19akadambu:1790: tābhyām etya nirasya tāpasatanucchāyāṃ duhitroḥ kṛte bhāsvatkautukamaṅgale navavadhūveṣe manohāriṇi /
GK19akadambu:1791: nirvṛtte ca samantrahomasubhagārambhe vivāhotsave tatrānyonyasamāgamapramuditāḥ sarve mudaṃ lebhire // AKad_8.98 //
GK19akadambu:1792: iti vitatavilāsaḥ puṇḍarīkeṇa sākaṃ divi bhuvi ca vicitrodyānalīlāvihāraḥ /
GK19akadambu:1793: abhimataphalasampadvardhamānābhinandaḥ śriyam abhajata candrāpīḍamūrtir mṛgāṅkaḥ // AKad_8.99 //
